attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now that Hong Kong has gone and the Gorkhas are upset with us, the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to be sensitive to issues around events in Taiwan to maintain British influence in the East. The colonial empire may have gone, but British influence is still significant - knowing the P.M.'s reputation, at home, I am urging you to be as strong in foreign affairs, don't let the further erosion of the Commonwealth be the mark of current premiership.

Thank you.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
